mapper.select: SELECT admin_id AS adminId FROM admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND admin_pw = PASSWORD(#{adminPw})

SELECT qnaboard_no AS qnaboardNo , member_id AS memberId , qnaboard_title AS qnaboardTitle , qnaboard_content AS qnaboardContent , DATE_FORMAT(qnaboard_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS qnaboardDate FROM qnaboard WHERE qnaboard_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') ORDER BY qnaboard_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_name AS memberName FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_name AS memberName, member_addr AS memberAddr, member_phone AS memberPhone, member_email AS memberEmail, member_pic AS memberPic FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
